infos.value: That mangy Muraga... I'd heard of his savagery, but to think him capable of such devious plotting...
Not what you'd expect from a man who takes what he wants by brute force, is it? Hah hah hah.
Be that as it may, our enemies don't appear to be as great a number as I'd expected.
It has been a while... Shall we give it our all, Master?
It's time we struck the fear of «Fortem» into the hearts of those who follow Muraga.
